name: NTO Tile: Product: Weather Driven
description: Simple 'weather driven' product tile component enabling the display of a product and linking to its PDP display.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Need Help?
attribute_definition_groups.description: To configure this component -- please select a product to render via the component (you can search for a product by specifying a sku or element of the product name).

attribute_definitions.name: Hot Product
attribute_definitions.description: Represents the 'hot weather' product to render in the tile.  Please ensure that the product is well-formed, online, and has images configured to display via the storefront.

attribute_definitions.name: Hot Product Message
attribute_definitions.description: Represents the 'hot weather' product message to render in the tile.

attribute_definitions.name: Cold Product
attribute_definitions.description: Represents the 'cold weather' product to render in the tile.  Please ensure that the product is well-formed, online, and has images configured to display via the storefront.

attribute_definitions.name: Cold Product Message
attribute_definitions.description: Represents the 'cold weather' product message to render in the tile.

attribute_definitions.name: Control Temperature
attribute_definitions.description: Represents the temperature that will determine a cold / hot weather product to show. For instance, if the Control Temp is 80 and the actual temp is 81, then the HOT weather item will be shown, otherwise the COLD weather item is shown.

attribute_definitions.name: Debug
attribute_definitions.description: Enabling this shows debug information related to the geolocation of the session cookie.
